metadata.description: US Data Centers: Existing 500MW+, announced projects, and anticipated growth to 150GW by 2035
metadata.notes: Anticipated facilities represent projected growth based on utility IRPs, interconnection queues, and AI demand forecasts. Includes major projects in PA (~$90-110B pipeline), MI (Stargate 1.4GW+), NC (85% of Duke load growth), GA (8.2GW over 6 years), and emerging markets.

properties.name: AVAIO Leo Data Hub Little Rock
